code: import React from"react";import{calculateTotalPages,displayCoursesBasedOnPageNumberOnModal}from"../utils/PendingStudentConnectionRequestUtils";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PendingStudentConnectionRequestModal(_ref){let{courses,currentPage,itemsPerPage,setCurrentPage,onClose}=_ref;console.log("These are the props that pending student connection request modal is receiving",{courses,currentPage,itemsPerPage,setCurrentPage,onClose});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modalOverlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modalContent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modalCourseCards",children:displayCoursesBasedOnPageNumberOnModal(courses,currentPage,itemsPerPage).map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"courseCard fullLengthCard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profileSection",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:course.profilePicture,alt:"Profile",className:"profileImage"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"courseInfo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"studentName",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Student:"})," ",course.studentName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"focus",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Focus:"})," ",course.focus]})]})]},course.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(currentPage-1),disabled:currentPage===1,children:"Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Page ",currentPage," of ",calculateTotalPages(courses,itemsPerPage)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(currentPage+1),disabled:currentPage===calculateTotalPages(courses,itemsPerPage),children:"Next"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"closeButton",onClick:()=>{onClose();setCurrentPage(1);},children:"Close"})]})});}export default PendingStudentConnectionRequestModal;
